attributes.action: Deal with medical conditions and to be more responsible with information sent
attributes.additional_details:
I have been waiting months for my driving licence to be reinstated following a medical condition and the time frame is too long
To date I've had two tests and passed both but the d v l a has (not received reports from my consultants)
Swansea deals with the whole country it's too much for them I know other people in the same boat
We as drivers need a quick response
